title: Ep 35 | Phil's Fashion Tips, Frozen Snakes, and Trump Impeachment
description:
Phil gives his advice on how to have the best wardrobe, Jase talks about his hunting trip in Kansas, and the guys share how we as Christians should react if President Trump is impeached.
